definition: pattern/way of doing sth/trick/(sports) fancy-style (as figure skating etc)
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
erhua variant of 搞花樣|搞花样[gao3 hua1 yang4]

sentences.english: If seller's designs are used, the design numbers must be stated in full.
sentences.chinese: 若选用卖方花样，必须详细注明花号。

sentences.english: Aerobatic flights over airfield up to 2000m.
sentences.chinese: 花样飞行在机场上空，高度2000米。

sentences.english: Chao signed with the image of cool tricks Linfair record.
sentences.chinese: 张超以帅气花样的形象签约福茂唱片。

sentences.english: This paper describes two microcomputer programs of electron diffraction spot patterns.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了两种电子衍射花样的微型机分析程序。

sentences.english: Drop the gun, and no funny stuff!
Jixiang products not only have excellent quality, but also have variety of patterns.
sentences.chinese: 吉祥的产品不仅品质优良，而且花样繁多。

sentences.english: Carla then expanded her scope to include speed swimming and synchronized swimming.
sentences.chinese: 卡拉然后她的范围扩大到包括高速游泳和花样游泳。

sentences.english: Office workers in South Korea have been trying various ways to peek at the Olympic matches during working hours.
sentences.chinese: 为在上班时间偷看奥运比赛，韩国上班族花样百出。

sentences.english: Her mother, Maribel , had won the U. S figure skating championship nine times.
sentences.chinese: 母亲玛丽贝尔曾九次将美国花样滑冰冠军收入囊中。

sentences.english: Want to put your doctor's stethoscope in a twist?
sentences.chinese: 想用新花样摆放医生的听诊器吗？

sentences.english: But my mom and stepdad were really into making events out of special days of the year.” My friend June smiled at the memory.
sentences.chinese: 不过我妈和继父很喜欢在特殊的日子里搞些花样。

sentences.english: That's an audiencethat's always looking for something new.
sentences.chinese: 总是有些观众希望看到新花样。

sentences.english: Use Flower Time Multiple-Purpose Eye Protection Package in beauty parlor professional nursing.
sentences.chinese: 美容院专业护理使用花样年华多效护眼套装。

sentences.english: The more variety you build into your diet, the less you stick to it.
sentences.chinese: 节食谱花样愈多，则坚持力愈少。

sentences.english: Finally, Zhu Pingkang won the first prize in the styling contest of motorboats with a score of 4297.
sentences.chinese: 最终，朱平康以4297分夺得摩托艇花样赛一等奖。

sentences.english: The designs are printed onto the pattern by hand.
sentences.chinese: 这个花样是手工印到图案上去的。

definition: move (in chess, on stage, in martial arts)/gambit/trick/scheme/movement/same as 著數|着数[zhao1 shu4]
to play with/to wield/to act (cool etc)/to display (a skill, one's temper etc)
to hit on sth new (idiom); to display originality/to adopt an original approach
item (in a program of entertainments)/trick (act of mischief)/worthwhile result/accomplishment/sth significant but not immediately apparent/sth more than meets the eye
bored/to be fed up with/sick and tired of sth
to mix and match (of clothing etc)
